sentences.en: Anna swivelled round to face him.
sentences.cn: 安娜转过身来面对着他。

sentences.en: CD storage cube, with 5 books holding totally 60 CDs . Swivel base.
sentences.cn: 这是一款装碟片的盒子, 共有5本,每本能存放12张碟片,底座也可以360度旋转.

sentences.en: Danny swiveled his chair away from me.
sentences.cn: 丹尼把椅子从我身边转开了。

sentences.en: Eg . The maximum swivel of the table is l 20.
sentences.cn: 工作台的最大回转角度是120度.

sentences.en: Flora restored the heavy swivel chair to its upright position.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉把那只笨重的转椅扶起来.

sentences.en: Front swivel wheels with suspension , Rear wheel with suspension and brake.
sentences.cn: 前轮避震可旋转, 后轮防震带刹车.

sentences.en: He leaned back in the swivel chair and locked his fingers behind his head.
sentences.cn: 他仰靠在转椅上，十指交叉枕在脑后。

sentences.en: His chairs can swivel, but they can't move up or down.
sentences.cn: 他的椅子能旋转，但是不能升降。

sentences.en: Hoses - Three 6 foot color - coded hoses with female threaded swivel couplings.
sentences.cn: 三条6英尺长彩色软管,带内螺纹旋转接头.

sentences.en: I spun around in my swivel chair and chatted with Jim.
sentences.cn: 我转动着我的旋转椅同一旁的吉姆聊起天来了。

sentences.en: Our main products are office chairs, boss chairs and swivel chairs.
sentences.cn: 本厂主要产品:办公椅、班椅 、 老板椅、转椅等椅子系列.

sentences.en: She returned to the swivel chair behind her desk.
sentences.cn: 她回到桌子后面的转椅上.

sentences.en: She swivelled her head round to watch what was happening.
sentences.cn: 她转过头来察看发生了什么事。

sentences.en: Swivel on the back foot, throw your hips , and keep your eye on the ball.
sentences.cn: 后腿转动, 髋部前倾, 双眼注视来球.

sentences.en: Swivel parts being connected Withbearing. It's comfortable when swiveling and gliding.
sentences.cn: 转动部件轴承连接,能前后摇摆转动更多舒适惬意.

sentences.en: The front wheels can either swivel or be fixed.
sentences.cn: 前轮可能或旋转或是固定的.

sentences.en: The practical side - swivel drawers collect and tidy away smaller items.
sentences.cn: 在实际方面旋转式抽屉收集和整理距离较小的项目.

sentences.en: The swivel had been oiled to perfection.
When using the swivel mount, the internal shock mount provides good isolation.
sentences.cn: 当使用转座时, 加以内部隔振垫可提供良好的隔振作用.

trans.tran_cn: 转节，转环，旋轴，旋转接头

trans.tran_en: to turn around quickly and face a different direction, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: （使）旋转，在枢轴上转动，（把身子或脸等）转向另一方，转身
